# Check the creation date
 # XXX Could be done in catalog, but it is not indexed in Vifib currently
 movement = context
 if (DateTime() - movement.getCreationDate()) > 1:
 # Instance is not done for more than one day. Search for explanation
 # does the computer tries to instanciate? If so, recent error_log should be available in log
 instance = movement.getAggregateValue(portal_type="Software Instance")
 
 history = instance.portal_workflow.getInfoFor(instance, 'history', wf_id='software_instance_slap_interface_workflow')
 error_report_found = False
 for history_item in history[::-1]:
 if history_item['action'] == 'report_computer_partition_error':
 error_report_found = True
 break
 else:
 date = history_item['time']
 if (DateTime() - date) > 1:
 # No error reported for one day
 # Computer seems dead/unresponsive: to be handle by another alarm
 break
 
 if error_report_found:
 # Partition can not be installed for more than one day
 # Destroy it by: cancelling the instance packing list and create destroy PL
 try:
 instance.requestDestroyComputerPartition(comment="Instance can not be instanciated for more than one day")
 except ValueError:
 # Under deletion already
 pass
